}

        if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && (playerdonator == 1)) {
                        String text = command.substring(8);
                                yell("[Donator]" + playerName +": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

item.title: [Delta] Yell command
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Recently i’ve been trying to add a yell command, i added almost all of it except for Donator, but i get an error whenever i try to compile it

Here’s The yell

[code]}

    if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && (playerDonator == 1)) {
		String text = command.substring(8);
			yell("[Donator]" + playerName +": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}[/code]

Heres the compiling error(I did try to add that symbol)

client.java:8239: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerDonator location: class client if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && (playerDonator == 1)) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Heres the thing that adds Donator to the character file

} else if (token.equals("character-donator")) { donator = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Any idea whats wrong?

Read full topic
